column1: Filibert Bolger was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Filibert married Poppy Chubb-Baggins. With his wife
column2: he was present at Bilbos Farewell Party.

column1: The name means "Fullbright" from fili and berht.Jim Allan (ed.)
2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:
:A Decipher card identifies one of the Hobbits at the Bilbos Party in The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring as Filibert Bolger. However
column2: in the film the same hobbit is seen cheering when Bilbo Baggins calls "Grubb Family!".
